channel.title: Clicking Button
channel.description: Hello Mopar, i have a question on one thing so when i go to click this button, it works.. but the other it doesnt load the other Port. Why is this? [img]http://i.imgur.com/b06E0nE.png[/img] when i click Economy it connects to the server, but when i click Spawn it doesnt connect to the other server? i have both running ports are changed. Just it will not connect to the other one? Can someone help me out with this please?

item.title: Clicking Button
item.dc:creator: @Project-Storm Project-Storm
item.description:
@Project-Storm wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:5, topic:550414”][quote author=Runecessor link=topic=669323.msg4475814#msg4475814 date=1425840365]

  1. Either you need to portforward the new port.
    [/quote]
    Or?
  1. some RSPS can only connect to certain Ports so what revision are you using as well as base?

That’s a lie. You just need to specify the port the RSPS needs to bind to.

  1. You are probably trying to run the server out of a separate folder if not on vps and running on your desktop.
    so you can put both servers in 1 file and use 1 run.bat to start both servers.

Has nothing to do with it. Where the source is being launched is irrelevant.

  1. well i’m out of quick ideas.

Then why did you add a 4th point?[/quote]

Lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Clicking Button
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Runecessor:

1. Either you need to portforward the new port.

Or?

Runecessor:

2. some RSPS can only connect to certain Ports so what revision are you using as well as base?

That’s a lie. You just need to specify the port the RSPS needs to bind to.

[quote=“Runecessor, post:4, topic:550414”]3. You are probably trying to run the server out of a separate folder if not on vps and running on your desktop.
so you can put both servers in 1 file and use 1 run.bat to start both servers.[/quote]
Has nothing to do with it. Where the source is being launched is irrelevant.

Runecessor:

4. well i’m out of quick ideas.

Then why did you add a 4th point?

Read full topic

item.title: Clicking Button
item.dc:creator: @Runecessor Runecessor
item.description:
@Runecessor wrote:

  1. Either you need to portforward the new port.
  2. some RSPS can only connect to certain Ports so what revision are you using as well as base?
  3. You are probably trying to run the server out of a separate folder if not on vps and running on your desktop.
    so you can put both servers in 1 file and use 1 run.bat to start both servers.
  4. well i’m out of quick ideas.

Read full topic

item.title: Clicking Button
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Are you sure the button is setting the port to the new one?
Are you sure that both servers are online and visible (using a site like canyouseeme)?
Also, it’d probably be beneficial not to run both on the same computer.

Read full topic

item.title: Clicking Button
item.dc:creator: @Project-Storm Project-Storm
item.description:
@Project-Storm wrote:

The second ports being blocked, or your software (computer, VPS) whatever is it may not support hosting two.
Now you know your issue, now the second part, finding it. This can be sort of tricky finding what’s blocking ports, I’m not myself going to go into detail on how, just google it. Or I could show you.

Read full topic

item.title: Clicking Button
item.dc:creator: @Soull3sss1 Soull3sss1
item.description:
@Soull3sss1 wrote:

Hello Mopar, i have a question on one thing so when i go to click this button, it works… but the other it doesnt load the other Port. Why is this?

when i click Economy it connects to the server, but when i click Spawn it doesnt connect to the other server? i have both running ports are changed. Just it will not connect to the other one? Can someone help me out with this please?
